name: Trust Me Dear !
description:
Trust Me Dear !

This Game is made by Nehal V (a.k.a bug)

The game is made for a game jam hosted by BenBonk. Which is 72 hour game jam. 

But i have created this game under 10 hours.

All the coding in done by me. 

All 3D and audio assets are download from internet. Which is completely free and free to use. All links to that  are provided below.

Please Play and Rate my Game.

THANKS TO ALL THE ARTIST WHO HAVE CREATED COOL 3D ASSETS, AUDIO AND PARTICLE SYSTEM AND GIVE THEM FOR FREE.

Link to Game Assets
